title: Nahdi Medical Swipes First Place Locally and Seventh Globally in The Fresh Connection Competition
text:
(MENAFN Press) Nahdi Medical Company, the largest retail pharmacy chain in the Middle East and North Africa, has exemplified its strength and expertise in supply chain management, ranking first place locally and seventh place globally in the "Fresh Connection" competition, which concluded on June 5th, qualifying Nahdi to participate in the finals in Amsterdam, in September, alongside other teams from around the world.

Nahdi took part in the competition that was administered by Trax Consulting, a business solutions and consulting services provider, with over 650 professionals, making up 130 teams from thirty countries, with 13 teams from Saudi Arabia. Participating teams were tasked with making strategic and tactical decisions to save a fictional company from financial loss and make it as profitable as possible. 

Eng. Yasser Joharji, CEO at Nahdi, expressed his pride of the supply chain department and said: "We are very proud of the outstanding results that were achieved by the supply chain team throughout this competition, and we hope that they excel respectively in the finals. At Nahdi, we are committed to providing great quality of the utmost standards throughout our various functions and departments."

Eng. Raed Jammel Monagel, Vice President of the Supply Chain Department at Nahdi, commended his team and said: "Our team has proved its worth, achieving a leading position in this realm amongst a large number of participants who took part in the challenge. We possess strong logistical capabilities that are based on a fundamental structure, adhering to the highest standards, in terms of storage, transportation and distribution, as well as product safety."

"The department functions following international standards and provides our pharmacies with various products within the specified time frame, ensuring our focus and attention to detail is unmatched," he added.

Nahdi is dedicated to improving its supply chain system by building a warehouse that is globally certified by ISO Global Standards, accommodating over 20,000 healthcare products, infant milk products, medication and beauty products, which will be distributed to various areas across Saudi Arabia, by a fleet of readily-equipped and refrigerated vehicles, amounting to a total of 85. The company will also continue to build its logistical infrastructure and develop supply chain solutions, as part of the company-wide development of a wide range of solutions and innovations.

Nahdi employees that make up the supply chain department oversee the warehouses, maintenance planning and transport. 

The Fresh Connection is an international web-based supply chain management learning program that has an annual worldwide professional competition at the organizational level. The Fresh Connection challenges are designed to deliver the ultimate value chain learning experience, helping to build true alignment between functions while developing skills and knowledge of participants. It is a valuable tool for developing cross-functional partnerships with key stakeholders in the value chain, and fortifying relationships with customers and partners. 

About Nahdi Medical 
Nahdi is a Saudi retail pharmacy chain that was founded by Sheikh Abdullah Amer Al Nahdi in 1986 as a sole proprietorship. In 2004, the company witnessed an important transitional phase whereby it became a limited liability company and from then on it was recognized as a vital part of the healthcare sector in the Kingdom. The journey of expansion continued with a clear vision, and has now placed Nahdi as the largest pharmacy retail chain in the Middle East and North Africa, where it represents many of the world's major medical companies. Today, Nahdi manages and operates a nation-wide network of pharmacies making it one of the most prevalent and fastest growing companies in the region, which offers the finest product range, including cosmetics, baby care and medical equipment. In addition to the high-quality healthcare products and services it offers, Nahdi is keen to provide community service and health awareness and preventative campaigns. Nahdi follows the concept of acting as a "community pharmacy," where it does not solely serve the community, but also educates it.
